name: VERGENCE
description:
Waking up in an old ruin, you find yourself at the heart of an centuries old struggle, between the world you know, and its alter; a place devoid of warmth, and home to sickly, green creatures.

Those you share your new prison with seem reluctant, or simply too fatigued, to aid you uncover the mysteries of these entwined worlds, but don't let that stop you. You must escape...

CONTROLS: A/D or LEFT/RIGHT to move. F to kill yourself and return to the last rested spot. O to attack and control descents (will be necessary as fall damage is brutal) You can press Esc at any time to return to the Main Menu, but please be aware that the game has no saving or persistent checkpoint system.
